entities.name: aberforth dumbledore
entities.description: Aberforth Dumbledore is standing blocking the corridor ahead. He is holding his wand ready, suggesting that he is prepared to defend himself or others from potential danger.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is trying to bat owls with her paws. The text does not provide any additional information about Mrs Norris, but it is clear that she is a cat and is attempting to return the owls to their proper place.

relationships.description: Aberforth Dumbledore is standing in front of Potter, blocking his path. This suggests that Aberforth is trying to prevent Potter from proceeding down the corridor.
Aberforth Dumbledore addresses Potter by name, suggesting a level of familiarity or authority between the two characters.
